title: Associate Director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA)
Interview Descriptions: First round interview was a phone interview with the search committee. Second round interview was on campus with various groups of people in the department and including a brief presentation.
Interview Questions: What was the hardest decision you made in the last year? What strengths do you bring to this role? What do you see as a learning curve for you in this role?

title: Member Of Technical Staff Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College
Interview Descriptions: Straight forward, the process was as expected. Waited to hear back but did not receive an offer. Questions were answered according to what was asked, simple enough. Everyone was nice but again did not receive an offer.
Interview Questions: why do you want to work here

title: Research Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA)
Interview Descriptions: I spoke with my professor and asked if I could join her lab team. She said yes, so the interview was quick. It was part of the summer research internship.
Interview Questions: Do you have experience with SPSS?

title: Special Collections Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Philadelphia, PA) in Apr 2018
Interview Descriptions: Being interviewed was straightforward. I was asked about my skills and qualities I could bring to the job and the courses I had taken in high school and in college that had prepared me for this job.
Interview Questions: What skills and qualities do you bring to this job and what makes you qualified to work with these aritifacts and archival materials?

title: Teacher Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Baltimore, MD) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions: The entire process took about a week, so it was a fairly quick response time.  The interview was brief yet efficient which made me feel comfortable.  I was immediately introduced to other staff members and students.
Interview Questions: Past experience with children

title: Dining Services Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 days. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: very quick meeting with the manager. signed documents and prepared to work that summer. very efficiently done and helped me to get my job settled quickly for the summer season.
Interview Questions: What are your avialableity hours.

title: Student Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: There was no interview process. As a student you just signed up and if you were work study you automatically got the job as a student worker in the dining hall.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Director Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA) in Sept 2014
Interview Descriptions: They brought me in to interview with several staff people throughout the course of a day. It was a great opportunity for all of us to interview each other. It was a very nice experience.
Interview Questions: They asked me questions about my experience, how that would lend itself to the job, why I wanted the job, and why Bryn Mawr in particular.

title: Summer Wyndham Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA) in May 2014
Interview Descriptions: I had a brief interview with the head of internal events, then a joint interview with her and the head of external catering. It took place in Wyndham, and the fancy decor was intimidating. It's pretty much just to make sure you're going to show up for work, to see how dedicated to the job you are.  Their idea is to hire the fewest number of workers for the summer so everyone gets plenty of hours.  This makes it hard for people to get shifts covered when there's an event (i.e. Bonnaroo) that everyone goes to. My tips: Dress nice, be polite and smile, seem like you're competent and follow instructions.
Interview Questions: Do you have any experience working in food service? On campus?

title: Information Desk Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA) in Feb 2014
Interview Descriptions: I came inth them about professionalism, punctuality, and decorum for two interviews, one with the assitant director and one with the director. I spoke with the director at length about different scenarios
Interview Questions: What was one way I dealt with a difficult situation

title: Laboratory Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College
Interview Descriptions: Just contact a professor and tell them you are interested. They will gauge whether or not you are a good fit based on your classroom experience.
Interview Questions: N/A

title: Resources Department Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA) in Nov 2010
Interview Descriptions: Interested candidates were asked to submit a completed preliminary application. This step consisted of basic information about the candidate, as well as the interest and knowledge of the department. After e-mailing the response, I immediately heard back from the recruiter and was asked for an interview. The interview was one-on-one. The recruiter discussed some background information of the position and then went into some role-playing to assess how we dealt with confidentiality issues, angry callers, etc. Position was given on the spot.
Interview Questions: What does working for the department of resources mean to you?

title: Office Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA) in Dec 2009
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was really easy. I knew someone in my department and has a short and informal interview one day when I stopped by. I wasn't looking for a job at the time, it just fell into my lap. They look for a great work ethic!
Interview Questions: If I would be able to work part time and take on this job part time.

title: Associate Director Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Bryn Mawr College (Bryn Mawr, PA)
Interview Descriptions: First round interview was a phone interview with the search committee. Second round interview was on campus with various groups of people in the department and including a brief presentation.
Interview Questions: What was the hardest decision you made in the last year? What strengths do you bring to this role? What do you see as a learning curve for you in this role?
